# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

### Features
- Length-based sequence grouping to minimize padding
- Thread-safe operations for concurrent access
- Automatic device detection and management
- Configurable timeouts and batch sizes
- Performance benchmarking utilities
- Memory-efficient processing
- Error handling and validation

### Examples
- Sentiment analysis demo
- Advanced benchmarking script
- CSV file processing example
- API integration example
- Performance monitoring example

### Technical Details
- Python 3.8+ support
- PyTorch 1.9+ compatibility
- HuggingFace Transformers integration
- Type hints throughout codebase
- Comprehensive docstrings
- MIT license

## [Planned] - Future Releases

### 1.2.0
- [ ] Multi-GPU support
- [ ] Custom tokenizer support
